item.title: Collar Type With Cup Filler Machine
item.dc:creator: zarainternational
item.description:
Brand: Zara International
  • Material Pack: Powder, granules, Tea, Snacks, Puff, Kurkure, etc
  • Weight: 50 grams to 250 gram
  • High Speed Production 

The post Collar Type With Cup Filler Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
Collar Type with Cup Filler Machine.

We have made recognition from our consumers by producing and delivering the best quality range of Collar Type Cup Filler Machines. With the knowledge and hard work of our organization, we have manufactured this using premium quality components in reference to industry norms. Our products are examined and tested by our quality assurance team. This Collar Type Cup Filler Machine can be used for filling and sealing the pouches or cups that are filled with materials as per requirements.

Features:

  • Material Pack: Powder, granules, Tea, Snacks, Puff, Kurkure, etc
  • Weight: 50 grams to 250 gram
  • High Speed Production 
  • Long service life
  • Robust construction
  • Low maintenance
  • Packaging Material: Heat salable Laminated
  • Films Roll Width: Max-425mm, Min.120 mm
  • Pouch Dimension: -200mm
  • Electrical Supply: 230v/AC/Single Phase/50Hz
  • Compressed Air Required: 6CFM,6 bar
  • Weight: 400 Kg (Approx)
  • Filling Range: Cup filler Adjustable
  • Pouch Type: Centre Seal Pouch
  • Height : 65-300mm
  • Power Consumption: 3Kw
  • Production Rate: 60 shots per minute(Varies with the nature of product & Filling range)
  • Machine Dimension : L-1050mm,W990 mm,H1360mm

The post Collar Type With Cup Filler Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.

item.title: Roof Tile Making Machine
item.dc:creator: zarainternational
item.description:
Brand: Zara International

Features:

  • Robust structure
  • High-end action
  • Reasonable maintenance cost

The post Roof Tile Making Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
Roof Tile Making Machine

Fully Automatic Cement Tiles & Bricks Making Machine, used for the Construction industry and infrastructure development purposes. With the help of our earnest experts, we are capable of manufacturing and exporting an extensive variety of Roof Tile Making Machine. Our skilled professionals make the adoption of premium quality elements in the manufacturing process of this machinery. It is in high demand in the construction industry and infrastructure development sector for making roof tiles, bricks, floor bricks, and providing appropriate construct to the tiles/bricks. Moreover, our customers can conveniently procure this Roof Tile Making Machine from us in various models of industry-standard prices.

Features:

  • Robust structure
  • High-end action
  • Reasonable maintenance cost

Characteristics:

  • Molding faster in velocity and greater in the output, it supports PLC computer torch to control systematically, man together with the machine the operation is more comfortable and reliable. Entire hydraulic pressure air operating. The speed comes 8 pcs/ minute. It is highly efficient in production and cheaper in costs.
  • It is molding and squeezing by using concrete and sand while filtering in between so that it can form a perfect design structure of various types with precision in sizes. Material is of high intensity and density, and it can meet the demands of every kind of construction and building requirements, it is splendid in the concrete products.
  • We can use this single machine in several ways by altering the mold attached to it, and after that, it can produce multiple items of tiles and bricks.

Technical Specifications

 

Formed Pressure 130 tons (Approx)
Formed Speed 7-8 tiles/min (Approx)
Producing 3500-3900 tiles/shift
Power 7.5 KW
Weight 5 Tons (Approx)
Overall dimensions 3100x1600x2600mm
Mixer Volume 350 L
Mixer Weight 300kg (C/S=1:2)
Mixer Time 3-5min

 

The post Roof Tile Making Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.

item.content:encoded:
Water Pouch Packing Machine

We are a distinguished corporation and suppliers of an outstanding quality spectrum of Water Pouch Packing Machine. This product is constructed by our professionals using quality approved materials in obedience to industry-established norms. This machine has multiple applications in the food and beverage industry, water treatment industry to packing pouch water products. Moreover, this Water Packing Machine is made available in diverse technical specifications at market starting prices.

 

Water Packaging Machines are used for packing pouches of food, beverages, drinking water, etc liquid pouches. These machines are exclusively designed for bringing an absolute packing solution for the packing of pouch water. Machines are consistent, highly productive, and have an unbroken operation of these machines keep us in the first row of leading machines manufacturers.

Features:

  • Material Packing: Liquid, Water, Shampoo, Paste, Semi-Liquid
  • Weight/Volume: 5ml to 100 ml
  • Unmatched performance
  • Less maintenance
  • Durable construction

Technical Specifications

 

Filling system Liquid Base, Pump, systems
Speed Capacity 40 to 70 bag/min
Power Consumption Motor 1/2 H.P.220 v AC single Phase
Motor Godrej (Crompton greaves)
TC. Dolphin Automation Digital
Panel Jiyalal enterprises/ Alpha Electronic
Film Roll size OD 100 to 3oomm max l.D. film real pipe 100 mm min
Heater 150×2 +300×2

item.content:encoded:
PASTA AND MACARONI MAKING MACHINE PLANT

We are a renowned name in the market as an edging manufacturer and vendor of the high-quality varieties of Macaroni And Pasta Making Machines Plant. Our clients highly praise this product because of its high production rate, which is about 200 to 300 kg per hour. This machine is available in distinct models, we mainly use this machine for making pasta and macaroni. In supplement, we manufacture these Macaroni And Pasta Making Machines at our technically sound manufacturing unit using the best quality components under the surveillance of our skilled team.

Features:

  • Noise-free operation
  • Robust construction
  • Low maintenance

 SPECIFICATION

  • All body parts in Stainless Steel, SS-304
  • Heavy-duty gearboxes of Bonfiglioli or Bonvario make.
  • Motor Bharat Bijli / Crompton (Godrej).
  • Production of pasta will depend upon the product. Approx nearly about 200 to 300 kg per hour
  • Die for different pasta shapes will be an additional extra cost.

item.content:encoded:
Kurkure Extruder Machine – Fully Automatic

In order to meet the varied preconditions of our valuable consumers, we have developed a broad assortment of Kurkure Extruder Machine. These machines are thoroughly designed and manufactured at our advanced manufacturing unit under the supervision of adroit professionals. We offer our specified machines with advanced automation that raises their productivity. Very well known for their striking features, these machines are broadly in demand in industries. We offer these at very reasonable prices.

FEATURES:-

  • Optimum functionality
  • Energy efficiency
  • Rust Proof.

SPECIFICATIONs:-

  • AC motor: 20 H.P
  • DC Drive: 5 H.P
  • Gear Motor: 5 H.P
  • Capacity : 50 kg to 100 kg / per hr (approx)

  • Stainless Steel Hopper, Vibrator Feeding System

Dimensions of machine:-
